title: Threads follows Twitter in limiting number of posts that users can see
description: Threads had a wildly successful launch amid a backlash against Twitter over limits on how many posts could be viewed. Now Threads is doing the same thing.

title: Ford slashes electric F-150 price as Tesla Cybertruck enters production
description: Industry analysts describe it as an aggressive attempt to gain market share from rivals Tesla and Rivian.

title: Smoking weed after work? A growing number of employers don’t mind.
description: As more states legalize marijuana, employers are opting out of testing for the substance — either by choice or as required by law.
